title: NotATether
author: NotATether
content: I am sure many of you have heard about the drama between MilkZ and Koil on this now locked thread. A summary of what happened is best provided by MilkZ himself:QuoteI have traded this user gift cards for a decent amount of time.  He goes first, no issues there.  We have not had a new trade for a while now because of my refusal to provide him positive trust.  As you can see he is VERY butthurt about it.Shortly afterwards, Koil was tagged by several DT users including myself.This flag is not so much about his trust begging as it is about his abuse and slander.Over the past two days, I have received very hateful PMs from this user (which I have subsequently reported) simply for tagging him for begging for trust which shall now be published here (it is strange that this user is now temp. banned yet for these remarks):#1:Quote from: Koil on June 13, 2022, 10:59:25 AMI never ever beg for any positive trust you blind autistic muslim nigger#2:Quote from: Koil on June 14, 2022, 07:27:33 PMkill yourself nigger  all of you are scamming scumbags:)Now I have a partiularly thick skin, but these unsolicited messages dropping into my mailbox every day are making me tired, so I blocked this guy from my PMs.I would like to emphasis that I had no correspondence on my part to Koil, and these were the only two messages exchanged.Link to flagProfile of flagged user

comments.author: The Sceptical Chymist
comments.body: Quote from: NotATether on June 15, 2022, 04:52:05 AMIsn't the second message a kind of death threat, that's punishable by 6 months ban anyway?Nah, as mean-spirited as it is, it isn't a direct death threat.  "I'm going to kill you/have you killed" would be, but recall that Vod implored Quickseller to kill himself a while back (and someone correct me if I've got QS mixed up with OgNasty; it's been a while), and there was a discussion about the nuances of that kind of speech.  Vod certainly never got banned.OP, the best thing you did was to block that fucker's PMs.  It's good you've got thick skin as well, because words can hurt.  Things from some random internet jagoff ought not bother people, but we're all built with different constitutions.I'm neutral on the flag.  I think Koli was being too aggressive in asking for positive trust, but I wouldn't tag him for trust begging.  And the mean PMs and spiteful stuff doesn't warrant a tag IMO--at least not from me.
